comments.body:
Created attachment 146405
Removal of ClassNameHelper and ClassRepository

omj.optimizer.ClassCompiler provides much simpler API for script compilation

comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 146406
Removal of ClassNameHelper and ClassRepository (without tabs)

comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body: This was done long time ago.

description:
I think it make sense to remove deprecated features now after 1.5R5 release
since doing so gives more chances to discover about embedding that can not leave
without them.
